text: Peter Leslie Shilton (born 18 September 1949) is an English former footballer. He has played for England national team. He has 125 caps for the England national team. This is more than any other player. Shilton was a contestant in the 2010 series of Strictly Come Dancing. ==Career statistics== ===Club=== Appearances and goals by club, season and competition Club Season League FA Cup League Cup Other
